item.title: FHN
item.description: score:14 Chances: First Horizon (FHN) has an impressive earnings surprise history. The company possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report. The price-to-sales ratio suggests promise for the stock. Risks: Need to monitor market trends and competition in the financial industry.
